location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.5595 of 1856 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to the Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is a covering letter, enclosing an extract of paragraph 63 from despatch no.24 of 1856 (folio 12) from the Court of Directors, dated 16 April 1856. The extract relates to an act of piracy committed by a subject of Kuwait upon the Amaieer tribe, and expresses satisfaction that the Resident Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball had obtained reparation from the ruler of Koweit [Kuwait].
